Humanized(TimeSpan, Int32, String)

Converts a System.TimeSpan into a string listing days, hours, minutes and seconds.

Declaration
public static string Humanized(this TimeSpan span, int depth = 4, string empty = "now")
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.TimeSpan span
System.Int32 depth

How many units to show, from 1 (only days) to 4 (all)
System.String empty

The default string if the timeframe is smaller than can be expressed.
